text: Nkechi Mbilitam (born 5 April 1974) is a Nigerian former footballer midfielder. Mbilitam played for the Nigeria women's national football team. She was in this team for the 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup and the 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1995 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Nkechi Mbilitam
